From the welcoming glass of Prosecco, recommendations of where to go, where to eat and how to make the best of this fabulous city to booking popular attractions and making sure that their friends look after you, their friendliness and attention to detail is spot on. This hotel is nothing like your average, anonymous gaff which is what makes it worth recommending as far as I'm concerned. If you want a great base with a little je ne sais quoi for a stay in Rome, you would struggle to beat Deko Roma.

Reviews.Title: “It's the best !!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: DIRHR27
Reviews.Content: I can’t say enough positive about DEKO ROME and Marco and Serena. We were greeted with open arms and welcomed to the city of Rome with an offer of breakfast at 4:30 am (US time) after our overnight flight from Boston. After only a few minutes and a brief conversation, we knew we had found some very special people. Our intent was to stay at a small boutique hotel, well appointed, clean and close to the center of Rome, and that is exactly what we found; not to mention that’s its brand new, in a beautiful historic building with marble floors and lots of security. We stayed for a total of five nights in two different rooms, pre and post our cruise. Both rooms were lovely but we enjoyed number 3 that opened up to the street we were on. The pictures provided on this site are the real thing. Feeling very safe with the US embassy on one side and a police station on the other; we were able to walk around after dark. You are close to taxis, buses and the subway. Actually, Marco will call you a cab that will pick you up at the front door. They arranged tickets, limo’s and recommended sightseeing and local restaurants that were perfect for us. We had everything we needed/wanted including a great breakfast of Italian pastries, cereal, yogurt, fresh fruit, cheese, meats and breads served with coffee and tea in a delightful café setting. The most impressive times were our personal conversations with Marco, Serena and Monica. They talked about the places to visit in their city but more importantly their lives, the culture and their dreams, and guess what; they were truly interested in ours. When we left, it was like leaving family behind, not knowing if we would ever see them again. You manage to “bump” into people along your journey that make a difference in the world and we found three of them at this hotel. So if you’re looking for the Ritz or midnight room service or a pool or 100 people dining at breakfast, skip this place; but If you want an up close and personal experience with wonderful owners who are passionate about what they do, this is the place to stay. We love you guys; you made our trip so memorable.

Reviews.Title: “not a hotel”
Reviews.Author: travelingguy11
Reviews.Content: not sure why this is number 1 on TA. its definitely a B&B. to be fair the staff were extremely nice and place was very clean. on the downside it was locked up at night with no staff and the walls were thin so could hear banging in the kitchen area at 7am. its nice but not 1 out of 1300 come on people. and way to pricey for what it is as well.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay in Rome”
Reviews.Author: toni K
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Dekorome during our trip to Rome with a tour group. We chose Dekorome due to others reviews here. We were not dissapointed. We stayed 10-15-17-2011. We stayed in the suite and the double room and loved both rooms. The decor is beautiful, the breakfast fresh and great. Marco was wonderful and helped us get around Rome and gave us suggestions on places to go in Rome. The reviewer on the "more of a b&b" might be correct, but that is the best thing about this place. It is NOT your typical hotel, if you want that there are plenty of those. That is what separates this place from the same ole thing. I stay in many hotels; and this by far will always be in our memories. Thank you for the wonderful last 2 days in Italy!

Reviews.Title: “Great place.”
Reviews.Author: pcrawford61
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed four nights in September. Great accommodations and great location. The owners make you feel at home. Take their advice on dining recommendations. They were excellent. We'll stay again next time in Rome for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Like staying with friends...”
Reviews.Author: Jetsetter310
Reviews.Content: Staying at the Deko Rome feels like staying at a friend's modern and well-appointed flat. The rooms are good sized, stylishly decorated and have all the expected things of a standard boutique hotel (tv, desk, safe, closet, etc). The room, common area and amenities are not what you would find from a five star such as the Four Seasons but you would be missing out if you made your decision based on that alone. Sure you compromise certain things bigger hotels can offer like a gym, room service, etc but why would anyone bother to workout in a hotel gym when they can walk or run around the city of Rome and why would anyone ever eat food served by a hotel line chef when you have hundreds of amazing places right outside your door? What sets this place apart from all other options in Rome aside from the value are the hotel's owners, Marco and Serena. In a nutshell, this young and attractive couple understand what travelers want and fill a major void in the hospitality industry today - value accommodations with a personal touch. Serena checked us in with a beautiful smile and a warm and friendly demeanor. She proceeded to spend 45 minutes pointing out all the city's attractions, restaurants, stores and anything else we were interested in using a handy city map while Marco served us refreshing cocktails from the bar. In all my travels, no concierge has ever been more spot on with their restaurant and shopping recommendations than Marco and Serena. Every place we visited based on their recommendations were truly great. Not only did Marco and Serena book our reservations, they had their waiter friends take care of us when we got to the restaurant. I would highly recommend the Deko Rome to anyone looking for a great value and experience. Notes: The hotel serves a generous portioned breakfast in the mornings served by Marco and Serena. Morning conversations are also a fun time as you plan the exciting day ahead. The hotel is near the popular Via Veneto, Villa Borghese, Spanish Steps, the Westin hotel, the US Consulate and the local police station. Taxi rides to most areas in the city are about 10 euro but walking + metro are also convenient. Melissa & Paul, 2011 (Stayed 3 nights)

Reviews.Title: “Home from home at Deko Rome”
Reviews.Author: rosie101010
Reviews.Content: Thanks to our friendly hosts Marco and Serena (and of course their charming helper Monica!), our stay at the Deko Rome made our visit to the eternal city very special. We will forever hold fond memories of this excellent boutique hotel - and are sure to return! From Marco’s very warm welcome - which included chilled fruit cocktails and a map marked with many excellent recommendations for eateries around the city, through to the generous breakfasts and the stylish bedrooms - everything was just right. We took up several of the recommended restaurants and were not disappointed and were delighted to experience places just off the tourist trail with excellent home cooked Italian fare. This young couple have only been running their business a short time but have clearly done their homework and know what it is that guests need to feel genuinely welcome and comfortable. A gem of a place which we would heartily recommend. Rosie and the Bear, 2011

Reviews.Title: “" Perfect Little Gem"”
Reviews.Author: choppydog
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Deko in September & can say it an excellent boutique property - great value. Marko & his beautiful girlfriend should be very proud. The venue is clean, modern & very comfy. You feel like you are living in Rome - location is great close to everything you could want - and any reccommendations from marco are always spot on! If we ever get back to Rome we would visit again for sure. Thanks for a great start to our holiday.

Reviews.Title: “10 star rating”
Reviews.Author: tocalifornia
Reviews.Content: Our group of three had a fantastic stay at Deko Rome. I would give it a 10 star rating if possible. The location was close to attractions ( we walked everywhere) and very safe, the room was spotless and hip, the restaurant recommendations were excellent ( loved Casa Coppelle),and breakfast was filling and delicious. Marco and Serena provided the best service we have every experienced in all our travels. They treated you like friends and were attentive to all our needs. We couldn't have asked for a better place. We would return in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: “Oasis in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Enj0ytheView
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at Deko Rome at the end of September. Deko Rome was beautifully decorated and we felt very comfortable in the newly-renovated, clean and modern rooms. The location is lovely- Deko Rome is located in a quiet neighborhood, away from the chaos of Rome. Serena and Marco were great host! They have a true passion for hospitality. Not only would we stay there again because it was so nice, we would love to see them again! Serena and Marco are true foodies- one word of advice is to follow their restaurant recommendations in order to get a good meal. They defiantly made our time (and meals) in Rome enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “A Home away from Home”
Reviews.Author: VincentLee
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Deko in early September and had a very wonderful experience. Serena and Marco are the best hosts we have met so far and I must say their service was impeccable and they have great taste in their restaurant selection. Go with their recommendation and you will never go wrong! Due to a flight delay, we reached the hotel very late at night feeling very exhausted, but our spirits were brightened up by Serena and Marcos' warm welcome and refreshing cocktail. We were glad to take up Marco's recommendation to take a cab from the airport to the hotel at EUR50 as we were already feeling very tired with all our luggages and reaching Rome late at night. The room was pretty new (about 5 months old) and nicely decorated. Location was good as it was near to a few attractions such as the Spanish steps (around 10-15min walk) in a quiet and safe neighbourhood (we could see many police cars parking outside the hotel. Overall we were very satisfied with the hotel and service and have no qualms recommending this to our friends. Thanks Sereno and Marco for being such great hosts! We left Rome making two Italian friends along the way. Ciao!

Reviews.Title: “NO complaints, it was great!”
Reviews.Author: nancysueSanDiegoCA
Reviews.Content: We started our Italy adventure by staying at the wonderful Deko. It is as good as all of the other reviewers report. It is brand new, clean, beautiful, and a perfect location. Marco and Serena are the perfect hosts. So sweet and caring. They offered suggestion of where to eat, (some of the best food we had), how to get everywhere we wanted to go. Breakfast was more than generous, and even shared a bottle of wine in he evening before going out to dinner. The location, next door to a police station and across the street from the American Embassy, and a block off of the very high end street Via Veneto makes it safe and quiet. The Metro is close by, as is a BNL Bank. We took Marco's advice and he had a driver pick us up at the Air Port. After being awake for 28 hours, we were thrilled to see him standing there with our name on a sign. We would never stay anywhere else when visiting Rome! You will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome gem!”
Reviews.Author: 4Doc
Reviews.Content: I used this site to choose this property in the spring of this year when it was rated #5 and it has since moved to #1 for good reason. Not only is the price very reasonable for Rome, but you get more than you pay for in service, location, friendliness and impeccable cleanliness. The rooms are modern and bright with high ceilings and spotless bathrooms. Whether its Marco or Serena welcoming you to your stay, they are both amazing, beautiful people with endless suggestions for things to see and places to eat (be sure to listen, they are bang on!). We really loved the San Marco restaurant two blocks away, best carbonara and gnocchi we had in all of Italy. Deko Rome is located in a very clean, very safe area across from the American Embassy, a couple blocks from Via Veneto (an exclusive shopping area) and at most a 10min walk to the metro and 10euro to the train. We actually took Marco's advice (thankfully) to have him book us a taxi from the airport to the hotel for 50euro, and the driver was waiting for us with a sign. He drove a newer Mercedes and was an awesome young fellow. What was even better was that there was a transit strike that day and we would not have been able to get to the hotel by bus or train anyway, and having booked the taxi thru Marco ensured we were not ripped off by an illegal taxi at the airport. The trafiic and the drivers in Rome are really crazy so be prepared for it, there is nothing like it I have ever seen before. Breakfast is served each morning with fresh fruit, cereal, ham/cheese, baking and tea/coffee and on evenings when we were home while Marco was still working, he offered us glasses of wine or presecco (for free) while we visited with him about our day. There is a great little grocery store one minute from the front entrance with everything you need from fresh fruit to bottled water, to wine, beer and dry goods. Deko Rome provides a mini fridge with free bottles of water everyday. I would highly recommend this property for a safe, worry-free place to stay in Rome while you are well looked after by Marco and Serena. They are both so amazing!!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoy to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Martin R
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Deko in September for a week. Everything was perfect! The rooms are cleans and larges, the services are good. Marco & Serena are very special people. We recommende to stay and enjoy the beauty of Rome!

Reviews.Title: “A truly great place to stay, it will MAKE your trip Rome.”
Reviews.Author: JohannaBananaBee
Reviews.Content: As you probably noticed by the numerous other reviews, Deko Roma has a pretty outstanding record in pleasing their guests, and I am another satisfied customer. I concur with the other reviewers when they say that their stay was fantastic and superb. Marco and Serena are not only great hosts but valuable resources in helping you enjoy your stay in Rome. You get the feeling that they genuinely care and want you to have the best experience possible. After an all day outing we'd usually wind down with Marco and Serena over a glass of prosecco and talk about our day. We also ate very well in Rome the best pizzas, pastas, and seafood (including affordable) due to their experience and advice. Apart from the service the rooms at Deko Roma are nice and spacious. We had the suite which we reserved for 6 nights at a price we considered a VALUE! Our room was always clean and air conditioned, which was nice since the average temperature was around 88 F our whole stay. I'm also an extreme germaphobe and noticed that this place was spotless, my toilet was disinfected and showers cleaned on a daily basis. Also I would like to add, that I left my Tiffany pearl bracelet in the bathroom after a shower and forget to place it back on my wrist before an all day outing. I would be lying if I said I wasn't concerned about it getting stolen, but when I came back to my room very late at night I was relieved to find it there exactly as I had left it. So all in all, this place is amazing and close to everything there is to see and you get free breakfast! I am planning my second European trip for next year and already plan to visit Rome again... there is no other place I'd rather stay.

Reviews.Title: “First class service at a beautiful hotel in a perfect location”
Reviews.Author: bethrhan
Reviews.Content: Before we booked to stay at the Deko we read the reviews on Facebook so we were expecting good things and we were not disappointed. In fact, the level of service far exceeded anything we could have hoped for. From the moment we arrived to the moment we left we were made to feel as friends not guests. From the restaurant recommendations to booking our places on the vatican tour to surprising us with an aperitif before we went out for dinner, Marco & Serena made us feel like they had known us for years and that nothing was too much trouble. When you factor in the stylish rooms and the perfect location, you have an ideal base for your stay in Rome. Book early because the hotel is not No 1 in Rome for nothing

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic honeymoon at Deko Rome....”
Reviews.Author: sarah_hawky
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at Deko Rome in late August for 3 nights for part of our honeymoon in Italy. I can't praise this place enough - every aspect of our stay was perfect. From the moment we arrived we felt so welcome. Marco sat us down, and over a glass of wine he went over a map of rome with us, highlighting the main sights, best restaurants, bars .etc.... We liked that he only recommended to us places he enjoys eating at, rather than typical 'touristy' places. And every meal we had was fantastic. Our room was superb - beautifully decorated and outstandingly clean. Our room was on the front of the building, and I wondered wether it might be noisy from the road, but in fact it was very quiet at night and not a problem at all. The bed was extremely comfortable! Breakfast was more than enough - cereal, yoghurt, pastries, fruit...... And Serena always served us with a smile on her face and keen for a chat! At the end of each day, we sat with Marco over a coffee or cocktail and he was interested in what we'd done that day. It really did feel like staying with friends, and their warm and welcoming approach encouraged all the other guests to interact and get chatting. Don't hesitate booking Deko Rome - we had a superb stay and were sad to leave!

Reviews.Title: “A Magical Experience”
Reviews.Author: Sean H
Reviews.Content: I cannot speak highly enough of the Deko. Marco and Serena's recently opened guest house is perfectly located (five minutes walk to the Villa Borghese), beautifully appointed, and immaculate throughout. What sets it apart from any other hotel that I have ever stayed at is the level of service that Marco and Serena provide. No sooner had we checked in than Marco talked us through all the delights that Rome has to offer over a glass of red wine. His restaurant recommendations covered a wide range of styles and price ranges and were unerringly excellent--the pick of the bunch was Pierluigi, an outstanding sea food restaurant where we celebrated my partner's 30th birthday. Serena prepares lovely breakfasts of fruit, pastries, ham, and cheese and her coffee is excellent. Don't hesitate to book here--as other reviewers have said, you will be made to feel like more like friends than paying guests.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing stay at Deko Rome”
Reviews.Author: sherdave5
Reviews.Content: I attended a conference in Rome and stayed at Deko Rome for 6 nights. I cannot praise it highly enough. The owners Marco and Serena and warm, friendly and tremendously helpful. They give you excellent recommendations for restaurants and activities. The rooms are modern and very comfortable. The location is excellent. I chose it based on the tripadvisor reviews, and I had the same wonderful experience. Don't hesitate to stay here, you will be glad that you did.

Reviews.Title: “Fab hotel in great location with excellent service”
Reviews.Author: emmarewmorgan
Reviews.Content: Brilliant hotel, very contemporary, clean and quiet in a safe location. Excellent service, very welcoming and helpful. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hospitality!”
Reviews.Author: Ndebrita1
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Deko in early August on our Honeymoon. Serena and Marco were outstanding hosts. We will definitely stay at Deko again!

Reviews.Title: “fantastic boutique hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: camilla22m
Reviews.Content: You don't know where to start from when explainig your stay at demo rome. Marco and Serena (the owners) welcomed us with a refreshing drink and a big smile. They were so kind to us throughout our stay (2 nights) and always ready to help (booking tickets to the Vatican etc..). As many tourists often get tricked to go to all these overpriced, non-local restaurants, Serena and marco gave us wonderful tips on where to eat, that was affordable and local food and....DELICIOUS! With their advice, we also went to great bars by the river and in the city.... places you would never read about in a travel guide! the hotel room was elegant and simple. the bathroom was very clean and the breakfasts were perfect to start the day. Unfortunately, I broke the bathroom seat by mistake. When I told Serena about it, I was dreading that I would have to pay at least 100 euros for it. straight away she reassured me and by the evening when we came back, the toilet was already repaired, without even asking to pay for the costs! (by the way,this doesn't mean that you can book a room and distroy it!!!) the location of the hotel was in a lovely neighbourhood, close to the metro and right in the city centre (we usually walked to places) overall, I cannot complain about anything. I would recommend this place for anyone, friends families and couples!

Reviews.Title: “Great find...”
Reviews.Author: DarrenPeter
Reviews.Content: Just back from 3 nights at this lovely property. More like a B & B than a boutique hotel...which suited us fine. Clean establishment with gracious hosts. Marco and Serena welcoming and offer suggestions along the way. Even though this was our 8th time in Rome, we took a couple of restaurant suggestions and loved them. Would not hesitate in recommending the Hotel Deko to anyone. Oh, and they are 'same sex couple friendly'. Did not find any English channels on TV (even though we are on vacation, some news would have been good). Also, love how the TV's have a maximum volume set (so as to reduce noise between rooms).

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional customer service. Fantastic location. Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Chris F
Reviews.Content: This boutique hotel is wonderful, superbly clean and comfortable with a delicious breakfast. The location is excellent; we enjoyed the short walk into the centre and could easily reach all the major sites within half an hour or so on foot. Buses stop just round the corner if you prefer and the metro is only a short walk away. The customer service is exceptional and better than anything we have experienced before. Marco and Serena are so welcoming and recommended some excellent restaurants / cafes and ice cream shops! We will certainly recommend this hotel to our friends and family should they be considering a trip to Rome. We only wish we could have stayed longer and do hope that we might return one day! Sightseeing/Attractions Tip : To avoid the queues to visit the colosseum buy your combined entry ticket at the forum during the late afternoon; enjoy the forum in the cooler part of the day then you can return to the colosseum the following day with the same ticket and go straight in avoiding the queue.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Sanctuary in Rome!”
Reviews.Author: SuperSeagull
Reviews.Content: Serena and Marco go not just the extra mile but far beyond that. From making sure your journey to Rome is as trouble free as possible. to recommending the best restaurants and the best site seeing tips. They make every guest feel like they are friends staying in their own home. Nothing is too much trouble. Their hotel is immaculately clean and well managed. Perfectly located. Quiet. Just a home from home. Wishing you both every success for the future. Thank you for a fantastic holiday.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous”
Reviews.Author: Rpgthegrant
Reviews.Content: We stayed this weekend can only say that the reviews you have read here are 100 percent accurate if they say 5 stars. Wonderful hosts, must have drunk my fill of marco's coffee ;) We wish both Marco and Serena the best, you guys really deserve it. Thanks for making the stay fabulous, the little touches do make a difference and your hospitality is very welcome and almost unique in this day and age. We would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel and owners!!!!”
Reviews.Author: HaythamGambia
Reviews.Content: I had just arrived from a holiday in Barcelona with my wife and 2 kids, the kids were tired as our flight was a 4 am flight, as we arrived to Deko Rome , Marco was there to give us a warm welcoming and a complimentary espresso. We felt so at ease an welcomed and Marco and Serena the owners show us all the right places to visit and to avoid the long lines we spent 4 nights there and we felt we were in our home, so relaxed and safe everything was clean and breakfast was so fresh, location amazing near everywhere and walking distance to all the main sites. Marco and Serena Thank you for a wonderful 4 nights at Deko Rome!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: connayd505
Reviews.Content: Marco and his girlfriend (owners) are so friendly and made us feel very welcome. They know the city well and were always happy to assist us. Everything was clean and nicely decorated. Deko Rome is located in a safe building and surrounding area. It's about a 5-10 minute walk to the metro and bus station. I would definitely recommend to stay here if you're visiting Rome!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely amazing”
Reviews.Author: Travellin4ever
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Deko for two nights and wish we could have stayed longer. We travelled around Italy for three weeks and the Deko was the best serviced hotel we had. Marco and Serena were wonderful hosts that went out of their way for us. We will definitely return to the Deko on our next trip to Rome, but for longer.

Reviews.Title: “Walk in as strangers, leave as friends”
Reviews.Author: myvacationmemories
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful elegant boutique hotel that is run by a young, hip, and fun couple that are gracious hosts (Marco and Serena). About the facility: the decor is modern and classy. Serena designed the interior and has put in a lot of thought about the little details. The kitchen/eating area is small and cosy, perfect if you are visiting with a friend or a sweetie. The entire inn is very hip and modern. The rooms are air conditioned, have a TV, large windows, and just the perfect set up if you need some downtime from the city. About the hosts: It's rare to walk into a hotel where you have such personal connect with the hosts. During my stay, I loved chatting it up with Serena while she makes one cappuccino at a time, or with Marco as he makes delicious cocktails. They will, in a heartbeat, suggest great restaurants, bars and gelato places. You can never go wrong with those suggestions. Marco's great about making reservations for you. I've ended up having the best meals, thanks to them. As Serena says, "you must eat fresh food" or you must visit such and such because it's very "characteristic." You won't really know the charm in how she says that until you meet her.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Rome & value for money !”
Reviews.Author: nat444444
Reviews.Content: A beautiful little B&B - very new, very modern and absolutely great value for money. The location is quite central with the bus stop just across the road and metro 10-15 mins walk away. Room was small but very clean and neat. The hosts Marko and Serena are very friendly and give plenty of advice on places to see, places to eat, etc. They are also really sweet and welcome you with a cup of coffee or proseco if you see them in the evenings :) Marko helped us with our bags both when we got there and left the place - big relief since our bags were so heavy by the time we got to Rome! Breakfast was really good - with a variety of items and very filling and tasty. Visting Rome in summer was quite exhausting as the heat just drains you - and it was a relief to have a place like Deko to go back and have a siesta to avoid the mid day heat.

Reviews.Title: “Travel made easy and cozy!”
Reviews.Author: Mattsfc
Reviews.Content: What a great place to stay in Rome! Marco was an excellent host, who helped out in so many different ways as far as advice on where to eat, do your laundry and reserving appointments to places that I would otherwise be standing in line for hours for which all made my trip easy. The place is very stylish, hip and new . I love the attention to detail that was put into the interior of the rooms, especially the bathroom I opted for the room with a jaccuzzi which was useful after walking around all day. My stay at Deko Rome was wonderdful and I highly recommend this place for the location, nice decor, and most importantly the hosts. Good people.

Reviews.Title: “Little Gem!”
Reviews.Author: s6rtd
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 3 nights in Deko, and we loved it! Brand new and spotlessly clean, sizeable room, minibar, modern bathroom with great shower - all better than expected. However the service and hospitality of the hosts, Marco and Serena, are unrivalled - we arrived late after a long day travelling and Marco welcomed us with cool fresh juice and coffee which was lovely. They made our precious time in Rome so well spent, giving great advice and recommendations on where to eat, visit etc, and all our requests for help were no problem - follow Marco's recommendations on restaurants and you won't be disappointed. You must try www.tavernaparione.com - the best meal we had in 10 nights in Italy and the best value too. We will certainly be back at Deko.

Reviews.Title: “Great alternative to a lower priced 4 star in a great location”
Reviews.Author: MarkToronto
Reviews.Content: Clean, brand new and reasonably well appointed, would recommend the Deko for those who do not need the extended services of a full hotel (like a 24 hour front desk). The room size and quality is comparable to a Rome four star: bigger that a closet, a sparkling bathroom, mini-bar, super high ceilings. Breakfast had variety and was much more robust than the typical continental style. Location is in between the US Embassy and a police station. About as secure as you could hope for. Although pretty high up on a hilly part of this hilly city, it is a short walk to Pzza Barberini and the Metro. Villa Borghesi is a 10 minute walk the other way. But, as everyone says, the incredible hospitality of Marco and Serena, the lovely hosts, make the stay memorable and so much more relaxing than a comparable boutique hotel. We'd happily stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “BEST experience I've had”
Reviews.Author: amerchan86
Reviews.Content: Did not know what to expect when coming to this hotel, but ended up having the best time here. Marco and Selena were so hospitable, friendly, and welcoming (I highly recommend joining them for aperitivos in the evening) that it changed the whole vibe of our trip in Rome. Marco's experience in the restaurant/bar industries in Rome allow him to make the most amazing recommendations for food and drinks in the city. The rooms are spacious and have brand new everything. My flight was not until 6pm on the last day, so Marco and I hung out in the lounge all afternoon just snacking, chatting, and drinking. This hotel was definitely a highlight of my trip. Am giving it the highest recommendation possible.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it!”
Reviews.Author: sunshinesl
Reviews.Content: Marco and Serena are wonderful hosts. We received a warm welcome and Serena explained the map and recommended some wonderful restaurants. The guest house is very modern and very very clean. The breakfast we received was the best we had in our two week stay in Italy. Lots of varieties and so much food. The guest house is a ten min walk from the sub way but right there is a bus stand which helps you when you dont want to walk to the sub way :) There is a grocery store right next to the guest place. Rome was our last destination and we really enjoyed our stay here.

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Antonio_e_Dulce
Reviews.Content: We have stayed with our 2 kids (12 and 10 years old) and we just loved it. Serena and Marco are the perfect hosts, they offered to make reservations in restaurants, buy tickets through the web to avoid queues and a map with the hot spots for ice creams!!!. We stayed there 6 days and we felt at home. The house is located near Via Venetto, a very exclusive area, served by good restaurants. We always remember the Serena’s smile and Marco’s Cocktails.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC FRIENDLY PLACE IN PRIME LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: Preisboxer
Reviews.Content: My father and I spent 4 nights in late May 2011 in this little gem of a guest house and had a fantastic time. It was easy to find in a prime location, but no trouble with street noise. The interior of the place is very tasteful, modern, yet timelessly classic. The rooms are spotless and the bathrooms spacious. The breakfast is really filling and we liked the little pastry/biscuit surprise at the end of the breakfast every day. In the vicinity, stroll along Via Veneto, but for food, check out the side streets to around deko rome itself. The best thing about this perfect place were the hosts, Marco and his partner (sorry, forgot her name) who made this such a great stay! The recommendations were spot on, the reception always very friendly and genuinely interested, charming and with a sense of humour as well as helpful when we needed attention. Such a shame that I haven't planned the next trip to Rome yet. I would definitely stay at deko rome and can not recommend it enough to fellow travellers.

Reviews.Title: “Marco is the best”
Reviews.Author: quikoni
Reviews.Content: I stayed in a few hotels while i was in Italy and this one was by far the best. Marco and his girlfriend were so nice and accomadating for everything. You could tell that they love their jobs. Selena never once was not smiling. The rooms are modern and comfortable. Marco was always armed with an espresso at a moments notice. Great location by the metro too. Great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST PLACE TO STAY IN ROME”
Reviews.Author: Annalucia5
Reviews.Content: Hotel Deko is hands down the nicest hotel I have stayed in. The rooms are beautifully decorated. Serena and Marco, the young and charming couple that run this gorgeous boutique hotel have done a magnificent job of blending modern and interesting design with historical architecture. My partner and I were so lucky to have found this little gem located near Via Veneto which takes you to all the important and beautiful sites Rome has to offer. Not only is it close to everything but after a long day of exploring Serena and Marco will greet you with a smile and a bottle of prosecco. It feels as if they are welcoming you into their home. They are filled with information on places to see and where to eat. I couldn't recommend this place enough. Don't bother looking anywhere else. - Anna Lucia

Reviews.Title: “If you want charm, service, quality, and location...look no further.”
Reviews.Author: arb59181
Reviews.Content: I've been traveling for the better part of 4 months and in the last weeks, I have found the bet hotel of my entire trip. Miy husband and I stayed here for 3 nights after (luckily) Marco emailed us to tell us of a last minute cancellation. Well, I'd just like to send out a heartfelt thanks to the people that canceled allowing us to stay in this amazing hotel. All the reviews below are accurate and I can do nothing other than concur. Marco and Serena run a lovely guest house and I can't say enough about their hospitality. We were rather exhausted when we got to Rome and though not nearly as chatty as normal, Marco and Serena immediately pulled us out of our sleepy shells and embraced us with their warmth and clear love of their city. And that feeling stayed with us for the entirety of our three days at Deko Rome. When we left in the morning, came back during the day, and left again for dinner...we were treated with all the friendliness of a long known friend or family member. And let me tell you, after 4 months of anonymous hotel receptionists, this is a true treat. In addition to general friendliness, Serena and Marco supplied us with excellent local suggestions for food, drinks, and things to do. The restaurants they suggest are their favorites and as a result, authentic and off the beaten tourist track. The hotel is new and spotless, truly a gem. It is also in a fantastic area that is within walking distance of everything, or near to all lines of transportation if you choose to take the metro or bus. All in all, we loved it...will be recommending our friends to come, and will be back again ourselves in the future. Do not hesitate, book Deko Rome before it's too late! Thank you Marco and Serena for a fantastic stay, you're truly amazing hosts, we'll be back!

Reviews.Title: “Honeymooners in love with Deko”
Reviews.Author: Kinesity
Reviews.Content: We came to Italy for our honeymoon and were unable to find the desirable hotel accommodations for a reasonable price. We liked the boutique style hotels and were recommended to stay at Deko. Marco responded to our request promptly and then met us welcoming at the clean, modern boutique hotel. His and Serena's welcoming hospitality was irrmeasurable and so nice to experience in such a large foreign country. They recommended wonderful restaurants, must sees and local establishments to try. Wifi is free, complementary breakfast was good and Marco was always willing to offer a coffee. It was very clean, comfortable and I would recommend it to anyone. Thanks Deko Rome.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING! STAY HERE!!!”
Reviews.Author: ez_mack73
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your time looking for other hotels. Book here now! Best value with the best location. Friendliest staff of all hotels in the entire world. If you don't stay here you are making a mistake. Wow, what a hotel! John & Anna

Reviews.Title: “Perfect spot - Highly recommended!”
Reviews.Author: Ashes2011
Reviews.Content: Deko Rome only opened a few months ago - but Marco and Serena do a FANTASTIC job! Everything inside is new, new, new and very clean + modern. The rooms are big and the bathrooms are amazing - the showers have great water pressure! The hotel is in a great location near Via Veneto and a close walk to both Barberini and Spagna metro stops. Both Serena and Marco can suggest amazing restaurants (try 34!) and the best places in the area if you need to run errands etc. I highly recommend staying here - the rooms are a GREAT value for Rome. I'll definitely be staying here the next time I visit, and will be telling all my friends to do the same!

Reviews.Title: “Sleek and stylish with brilliant hosts.”
Reviews.Author: Liz1985
Reviews.Content: We were welcomed into the boutique hotel with a warm smile and a freshly brewed espresso. Serena and Marco were superb hosts, even sharing their family's home cooked goods with us over a glass of wine. This hotel oozes style (expecially the Deko chairs!!!) with Serena choosing and even designing some of the hotel's pieces. The rooms are sleek and spacious with fantastic en-suite facilities. Deko Rome is in a great location, set in a very high-end area of Rome. Walking around this area, we felt very safe and were within easy access to all the main sights. Marco and Serena also recommended places to eat and drink nearby which did not disappoint. We will definitely be back and would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to visit Rome.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice and cosey hotel”
Reviews.Author: Alexvh
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel for a city trip in Rome. As soon as we arrived we felt very welcome. New, clean, modern, good located and ran by 2 great people, that run this hotel with there heart.   The hotel is nearby the spanish steps, trevi fountain and villa Borghese and is in a nice and safe area.   Marco and Serena thank you for the very nice days we spend in your hotel and I am sure if you keep this level of friendliness and hard work that the hotel will be a very great success.   Joanne & Alex

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful homely stay at a safe & great location, best hosts ever”
Reviews.Author: Snehal_India
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Deko Rome for 4 nights. Before arriving, I was a bit worried about the stay as it was a brand new hotel with no reviews or website yet .But there was absolutely nothing to worry about.. it turned out to be an amazing stay in Rome and all due credits to the lovely hosts:Marco and Serena.They are a perfect combination of a homely and professional hosts.Marco gave us a warm welcome and provided with lots of useful information about the city. The hotel is so beautifuly decorated, clean and with all amenities.The selection of everything in the hotel is so perfect and decent ..right from breakfast knife,spoons,crockery, bedsheets,chairs,lampshades,cushions,bathroom accessories, reception desk..the list is endless! Serena , an interior designer herself has really put her heart and mind in decorating the hotel adding it to the personal and homely touch of our stay. Location is great.Very close to the famous street Via Veneto and also safe as its located very near to the US embassy and many other embassies nearby.The bustop is right down the hotel and both the metro stations (Barberi & Spagna) are 10 mins walking distance. Many excellent restaurants and cafes are located in 2mins walking distance from deko rome.Marco has a great taste of food and suggests various amazing & affordable restaurants depending upon what we wish to eat..even excellent vegeterian restaurants! Great breakfast is provided in a cutely decorated breakfast room.Rooms,bathrooms very spacious.Comfortable beds, good A/, heating facility, Wifii provided. Marco, Serena were so generous to offer coffee/juice everytime we came back after a long day of sightseeing in the hot sun! We had taken a taxi pickup drop through Marco which was good and at a reasonable price.Even the taxi driver,isnspite of the language problem gave us a short city tour on our way from Airport to the hotel! At the time of leaving the hotel we all were so sad to see off our new friends Marco, Serena and their Deko Rome :( Overall, a fantastic stay with good memories of Deko Rome. Thanks a lot of your hospitality and good times which we will cherish forever!

Reviews.Title: “Great value for location and outstanding staff”
Reviews.Author: Canadiantravels
Reviews.Content: We were quite lucky to have stayed at Deko Rome. We were initally going to stay at Piccola Maison but Georgio recommended that we stay at Deko Rome since it just opened and was more suitable for families with children. I was a bit hesitant at first since there were no reviews and it would have only been in operation for two weeks once we got there. But I had nothing to worry about. We had a large room on the quieter side of the building. It had a separate bedroom with crib and the living area had a pull-out sofa bed as well. Everything was brand new and working well. There was also air conditioning which we could control and two flat screen TVs. They also provided free wi-fi. The hotel is located on the second floor (third level), and there is an elevator that runs from the first floor (second level) so you do have to climb at least one flight of stairs but it's an easy climb. We were travelling with two children and Marco would help us with the strollers and luggage. Breakfast was included with the room. It was a very generous breakfast, which included ham, cheese, pastries, cereal, yoghurt, breads, juice, tea/coffee and/or milk. It was so large that we had to tell them not to give us so much! And Serena and Marco would always offer a coffee to us when we returned to the hotel after being out. There is also a small grocery store just below in the same building (Despar). Serena and Marco allowed us to use their microwave to heat up any food for our kids. The location was very convenient. We were 10 mins from two Metro stations: Spagna and Barberini. The Trevi Fountain and Spanish Steps were a 15 min walk away. The hotel is also very close to a park/garden (Villa Borghese) which we visited twice. There are bikes you can rent, a zoo, a small children's area and areas where you can have a picnic or have a nice stroll. There are also some nice restaurants very nearby and a couple of car rental places less than 5 mins away (Europcar and Avis). Serena and Marco provided us with several restaurant suggestions and they were all very good. The staff and service definitely exceeded our expectations. Deko Rome is a boutique hotel and the "front desk" is available from 7am-9pm. It is a small hotel so the people there are very personable and accessible. If they were not around, we could always contact them by phone, around the clock. But we always found them around and never had to contact them outside hours. They can also arrange for a discounted taxi to the airport if you need one. In the hotel business, service is what really makes one hotel stand out from another. Deko Rome provided us with great service while we were there. They helped us out in every sense and treated our kids so kindly. Not only did we enjoy our stay at Deko Rome, we also made friends during our stay. Thank you Marco and Serena for your hospitality, kindness and generousity. You made our stay an unforgettable one.

Reviews.Title: “beautiful hotel in a beautiful area”
Reviews.Author: elondon123
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I were staying a night in Rome and ended up staying in Deko Rome..in 3 weeks of traveling and staying in 12 cities- this was by far the best hotel we stayed at. The rooms were gorgeous and looked like they came right out of a high end designer magazine. As soon as we walked in we were greeted with smiles and lots of information. They have great knowledge of the area and can answer any questions you have..recommended a GREAT place for dinner that was delicious and so affordable. We were actually sad the morning we left that we were only staying one day- next time we're in Rome, we're definitely coming back to Deko Rome!
